Lawrence.House at 922 Dale Street: The House at 922 Dale Street is a historic First Period house in North Andover, Massachusetts. It is a 2.5 story wood frame house, five bays wide, with a small side porch and a rear single story addition. The oldest part of the house is the right rear portion, which is sestimated to have been built in the first quarter of the 18th century, along with a central chimney.
